website_summaries.verdict: Intended as a monitor that can handle long work days without losing picture quality or straining a user's eyesight, this is a good option for users who want a dedicated work space monitor.
pros: The monitor's sleek design looks professional even when not in use, and the 1080p display offers a superior picture while reducing text blur
Brightness and contrast settings are easily customized so users get the right picture for them
24" screen is also a nice feature for a long work day, making everything visible and easy to locate, even when multiple tasks are opened at once
cons: Screen takes up more space than a compact monitor and may not fit well in small work areas or on desks with limited space

customer_reviews.title: Can NOT be mounted but but aside from that it's good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these monitors, I was really excited to buy these BUT so disappointed that they can't be mounted. ughhh!!! Screens are great and the picture is phenomenal, sounds is okay but they're monitors (so, you'll need separate speakers if you want better sound), the picture is great and they work well. But super disappointed someone created an adapter that can be bought separately to mount these but each adapter is over $30 each, so, you're better off buying monitors that can be mounted....if you plan on mounting them. I'm returning mine but here's a link to the adapters for mounting them
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Guy

customer_reviews.title: 24 and 37 inch are not the same monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty upset with how different the 37 inch and the 24 inch were, I was expecting the same monitor but they were quite different. My 37 had a nice crisp picture but my 24 was tinted (even after adjusting settings) and I noticed a lot of things were different even though they looked to be the same design. The 24 inch had a slight yellow /pinktint to all the whites which I absolutely hate. The picture isn’t horrible by any means but I could have bought a Samsung for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. It only works correctly half the time ( and I’m being very generous). Most of the time I get this lovely fuschia hue over the entire screen that makes it unbearable to look at. Sometimes after I restart my computer 5 times or unplug and plug the monitor back in it will return to its normal color.
customer_reviews.author: rachel edwards

customer_reviews.title: Price point is good
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was purchased to be used with my work laptop at home. The price was right, but the stand was very, very, wrong. My daughter called it a bobble head, it was that unstable. I contacted CS and said that perhaps the stand was defective and they said, nope, that's the way it is designed, so I said send me a return authorization. Then I submitted a video to them and they agreed that perhaps I had a defective stand and sent me a replacement. It was a hassle, but now the monitor is great and exactly what I needed for the budget I had.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor and a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: As a retired photographer I had planned on getting the Viewsonic 27 inch 2K but finely decided I could not justify the price for what I do now. Being a Viewsonic fan I saw this at a great price and took the chance. Glad I did as it more than meets my expectations. Contrast is good and color rendition is great. The assembly of the stand was simple and is very sturdy making the whole unit look great. I highly recommend it for those on a budget or not.
customer_reviews.author: DMAdam47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. I've had it over a year and it's holding up great
customer_reviews.author: TheFemGeek

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these that “worked” for about 30 days. After that, they’d act like there was no video feed and would only work if you reset the machine (tried 2 laptops and a desktop and swapping power supplies). Then one got worse. It would work for about 2 minutes then would be completely non-responsive even with the built in buttons. Tried opening a ticket for both problems and after having to escalate through another unofficial channel, I was begrudgingly informed I’d have to send it in for a warranty repair. Kicker is, I’d have to cover the shipping on their broken product to Texas.
customer_reviews.author: Al0ysiusHWWW

customer_reviews.title: Thing, bezel-less, bright
customer_reviews.text: I am actually blown away by how thin, sexy (bezel-less) and retina-searing bright this monitor is for the price! Totally worth it for me - it basically reminds me of a modern phone or tablet with those qualities. The on-screen display menu (OSD) is actually very intuitive once you realize that the keys are basically softkeys that change function depending on what contextual icon is shown above them. The colors are amazing once you calibrate the monitor through the OS settings, and again the brightness almost sears the retina - I had to turn it down with the built-in OSD menu :-). I recommend that you give this monitor a try.
customer_reviews.author: BG in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Cord stopped working within a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: I purchased 2 of these a few months ago. They were working fine and then suddenly one of the cords stopped working on one of the monitors. I am upset I have to purchase a replacement cord so soon after purchasing the monitor. Pros: The setup was easy. They worked fine as dual screen monitors for my laptop. They very thin and light. Update: Called customer service and they answered very quickly. They sent me an e-mail to fill out some information to send over a replacement cord. Very simple and painless. I will update again once I receive the replacement. Other: I do wish they had some USB ports on the monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Sourav Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Says that it is VESA mount compatible. It is if you buy a $32 adapter.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor seems nice. It has good color, good viewing angle and very thin borders. As the headline mentioned it is NOT VESA mount compatible without a $32 add on bracket. If my new $180 monitor says that it is VESA mountable it should be without buying extra stuff. It would get 5 stars if not for the misleading description and epic disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lantern Sales Guy

customer_reviews.title: Generally good monitor, recommended for people who don't have the greatest vision
customer_reviews.text: This is a NICE monitor for visually impaired people (up to a "reasonable" point). I have 20/60 - 20/70 vision (and mostly UNCORRECTABLE), but yet I can operate at 1600x900 rather comfortably. However, in very dark scenes, you can see edge lighting here and there along edges of the screen. There are a couple of annoyances due to default settings in the menus, having to do with optimal resolution REMINDERS and auto aspect detection being turned OFF by default. Both problems can be remedied through the onscreen menus.
customer_reviews.author: John G. Nozum

customer_reviews.title: Good On A Budget
customer_reviews.text: I picked up two of these because my one of my old monitors wasn't cutting it anymore and I'm happy with what I got. The 7ms response time isn't stellar for video games, but I honestly have trouble seeing the difference between thise and my old monitor's 5ms. Yes, there is some blur, but I play a lot of R6S and I haven't noticed any difference in how I'm playing. If anything goes wrong with these in the next few months I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Not the old viewsonic quality I knew in the past.
customer_reviews.text: Started blanking out at various times. returned Sound weak . very hard to get to buttons to set up. No on screen setup. Stand ??? design.. Will not buy again. Why no on screen setup, no drivers cd?
customer_reviews.author: Jim Willis

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture - Cheap Stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second monitor for my home office because the price was reasonable and because of the full HD display. Although, the picture is quality, the stand leaves much to be desired. First, the stand is extremely difficult to get connected to the monitor. I had to use a small mallet to get it in place. Secondly it just feels like it is not attached very well. If you touch monitor it shakes and just doesn’t feel secure. The cheapness of the stand aside, this monitor does the job for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schill

customer_reviews.title: Defective Stand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor but I could not connect the stand. I tried, my husband tried, seller did not provide any helpful information, they referred me elsewhere and they were unable to offer me any assistance. Truthfully, I needed a monitor quickly so I just went out and bought another. I have this one to a neighbor. I told them if they went on line, they could find the "mounting materials" and they could use it for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Yonkersgirl

customer_reviews.title: A good user manual with detailed information
customer_reviews.text: User manual lacks information. There is no diagram of all the controls. For example, there are buttons on the right bottom of the screen which ae not explained. The Quick Start guide has a diagram of a finger touching a power ON icon. The icon is located on the font bottom right of the screen, touching it does nothing. You have to push the button under the icon. There are five additional buttons beside the power button. There are NO instructions on what they are for. I had to call Technical Support twice, search on-line and experiment before I finally learned how to use the controls, (see attached figures).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very modern. Built in speakers are REALLY bad
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This monitor has a great picture The design is top notch & very modern. Thin, & I do mean THIN, it's thinner than a pencil or my phone at the back, quite impressed Cons: The built in speakers are so pathetic it's kind of a joke that they are even there. (it does have a buldge at the bottom of the back where better speakers could be placed) was not able to find the "blue light filter" I use this feature on other screens like my phone, tablet, and tv.. especially when I'm recovering from a migraine & can't take the eye strain.. couldn't find the setting for that on this monitor even though it says it has it.
customer_reviews.author: SrHass

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, Bought Two
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these at the start of quarantine. Great monitor, sharp picture. I bought a second when it was obvious that quarantine was going long. The only complaint I have it that the single point stand is not the most stable. Even the slightest movement of the desk makes the monitors shake back and forth a bit. One of them has a bit of a lean to it as well. It was noticeable at first, but is less so now.
customer_reviews.author: NDruid

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for $99 on Amazon Prime Day. It is surprisingly thin. The stand is sturdy and good looking. I was torn between shelling out some extra cash, and getting a 27 inch, but once it arrived and I set it up I was glad I didn't. I would need a much bigger desk for a 27in. The screen is currently about 42 inches from my face in my seating position. I use this for PC, and light gaming. No dead pixels. It has several game and view modes to select from. Resolution is great, and I'm glad it came with an HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: M3rKn

customer_reviews.title: Stand is not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like ViewSonic. My previous monitor for over 5 years was from ViewSonic. However, the monitor stand is too flimsy. Even gentle typing causes the monitor to shake, which is unacceptable. There were no issues with the display itself, so hopefully the company makes the stand sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Aragorn

customer_reviews.title: What a great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of these for the same customer since the colours are so vibrant. They use them for work, and work great these do. They look elegant too. Will probably be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting..
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is aesthetically pleasing to look at. However, the yellow glow on the black screen is ridiculously noticeable and an eyesore to look at. It's a shame because it was a perfect monitor for my setup and unfortunately had to return it. Also, the bezel was coming off on the top of the screen so there was some bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great picture, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great, great quality at a great, great price. I can't believe how thin it is!! My wife wanted a 2nd monitor for when she works from home. I did some shopping and you can never go wrong with a Viewsonic. They've had quality products for 20+ years and this was no exception. She loves how crisp the lettering is & set up was a snap. Windows 10 recognized it immediately. I highly recommend this monitor...as a matter of fact I may get another one to replace my aging 23" monitor that is freaking out on occasions.
customer_reviews.author: John A Waclawski

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality with some questionable design
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Viewsonic monitors. After opening the box, I found the setup was a little tricky with a useless manual to tell me if I was doing the right setup. Pros: Slim profile screen looks very slick. Picture quality is very good to my mind. Coms: Unlike my previous Viewsonic monitor which as 2 buttons to let me quickly select which computer to connect to. This new VX2776 does not provide that nice feature, I need to go through the setup screen to select the connection which is somewhat not user friendly. Built-in speaker is somewhat monotonic and I decided that I will never use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly with a 2017 iMac
customer_reviews.text: An older TV/Monitor would not work with the new iMac. I tried a lot of adapters and cables. Nothing worked. I started to wonder if anything was compatible. I've had 2 of the old huge Viewsonic monitors on older computers and they still work so after much research I decided to go with Viewsonic VX2476-smhd and it worked instantly. I didn't even make any adjustments to it and the graphics and text look great. It has a modern, chrome design so it looks good next to the iMac too.
customer_reviews.author: ginwc

customer_reviews.title: Can't mount to universal or vesa mounts, and the included stand offers no adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This product's listing should highlight the fact that you cannot mount them to any other kind of universal or vesa mount. This would be less of a problem, although it is still a problem, if the included stand situation didn't suck. You get a tiny bit of tilt, that is all, no portrait/landscape, no height adjustment at all. This should be pointed out more clearly. I bought 2 27's and 2 32's will be returning them all. The picture also is dull, and there are inconsistent spots with the backlight.
customer_reviews.author: cahoot2005

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Crisp color and graphics
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this monitor. The slim size and crisp color is really a treat. It is easy to set up and works fantastic. I am replacing my old Vx2433wm monitor and I did not realize how much I have been missing. I picked this monitor because it had a remote power supply. I lost the power supply on my old unit due to a lightning strike and the replacement would have been more money than the monitor was worth. UPDATE: 1 month later and this monitor has really worked great. It is getting a heck of a workout being on 24 hrs a day. Color is sharp and drivers for windows 10 are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for when I travel....  Great Picture and FR
customer_reviews.text: I spend a month in NYC each year. I needed this so I could set up a second screen so I could work easier there. The plan was to pack it away each year for me to use it the next year........ Well my sister saw it................... So much for packing it away. Will be ordering another next year because I know I will never see that one again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nasc

customer_reviews.title: This will due.
customer_reviews.text: Those of us who still have jobs are so very fortunate in March 2020. I purchased this to create a home office since we are strongly discouraged from going into the workplace. I would not call this my forever computer monitor, but it will do. Great for the price. Also, arrived several days earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: John M Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Multiple connections. Great picture. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a 22” monitor with multiple connections for my home 8-camera surveillance system. This monitor fit the bill and doesn’t disappoint. My old 22' monitor only had DVI and VGA connections. I needed an HDMI since my Hikvision NVR only has HDMI out. This monitor also has DisplayPort and VGA connections.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great for day trading!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a medium size screen. I didn't want to have to search for things like on a bigger screen. These rock! The sound is decent if it's quiet in the room. Any noise drowns it out. I've used both HDMI & display ports. They work fine. I run two of these screens. YouTube is clear as a bell. No lagging.
customer_reviews.author: Trader Dave

customer_reviews.title: Needs external color calibration
customer_reviews.text: I'm a photographer and does a lot of video work as well. The screen is great for the price with the sRGB %. But, it lacks adjustability function and the color is pretty off from factory. There are no ICC profile available. That said, you will need an external calibrator to get proper color out of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Chung

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Setting Menu Shows up Repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing shopping. I bought this monitor five months ago and the setting menu started to show up spontaneously two months ago. And now, the setting button are totally out of condition, making the setting menu appear repeatedly. After contacting the customer service, they just told me I have been already out of warranty and I have to pay for the freight ($50+ via ups). Totally waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J

customer_reviews.title: High-quality display, low-quality stand.
customer_reviews.text: High quality display for work and watching videos. I'd give it 5 stars if the base was more stable. Seems like there's a ~2 degree give in both directions between the base and the monitor, so it shakes at the slightest disturbance... including whenever I'm typing on my keyboard (not a mechanical keyboard, either). Will likely have to buy an arm of some sort to stabilize it.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around and for the price this monitor is great! I saw a few reviews mention the shiny part on the base but I have no issues whatsoever with that. I use it for gaming and work so I'm on it a lot. I recommend it if you're looking for a budget monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price.......
customer_reviews.text: ..... this product was recommended by a relative who said it was a great buy. I thought my previous monitor was good, but it was starting to fail. This ViewSonic is a welcome upgrade. It arrived as it should, had a great price, and is so much more detailed with GREAT color (or colour, if you're in the U.K. :) ). I am pleased with the ability to reduce the blue light setting.........and did I mention the wider screen from my previous is jaw dropping. With all this "wow" I just hope it lasts....... :)
customer_reviews.author: Amid N. Civility

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor but faulty stand and difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: Installation of the stand into the back of the monitor was a huge challenge. I had to call the manufacturer, and even the supplied videos did not make clear how to accomplish it. Essentially the pieces didn’t fit together properly. Eventually with some adjustments using pliers and elbow grease I was able to get the pieces together but it took hours of my time and was really frustrating. Now that it is up and running, I am very happy with the quality of the monitor but gave it a 3-star overall review because of the difficulty and delays in assembly.
customer_reviews.author: SJO in SF

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my needs, and a very cool product
customer_reviews.text: i just need a lightweight monitor so i can work on my music when i travel, or change studios. it's beautiful, very light, and looks fine. i am not doing design, i don't know how it rates in terms of that, but for portable music work, it will be GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Supove/Randy Woolf

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and solid feel
customer_reviews.text: The stand is strong and a work of art. Not like some plastic stands that barely hold the display up. I always have liked ViewSonic diplays and this is a beauty. I use it with an HDMI cable but wanted to be ready for the display port when I upgrade my PC someday. I don't use the display's speakers so I can't say much about the sound quality. I got a great deal on this display so that was just icing on the cake so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: College student wanting to get a monitor to have a better online class experience. I bought the refurbished one but it came absolutely shattered. The screen is so broken it's actually unbelievable they would send it. No scratches or dents on the box. I'm so disappointed with this product. It's the first time I take a risk a buy the refurbished electronics because college but never again. Do not take a risk on these.
customer_reviews.author: DO NOT BUY

customer_reviews.title: A good product from a great company
customer_reviews.text: Brought 3 if these monitors for a nice triple setup. The monitors are easily assembled, very sleek with their super slim borderless design, and the power and video inputs are easily accessible. I replaced 3 "gaming" ASUS 1080p monitors and I have to say I have a much better picture quality and I didnt have to change the initial picture settings. The refresh rate is decent for the price all in all I'm very happy with the purchase. Also wanted to shout out View Sonic, my order initially got lost by FEDEX and view sonic had me reprocessed and shipped when in a few days. A fantastic company that obviously cares about their customer.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier L. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 27 inch budget monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Good if you're looking for a budget monitor at 27 inches. 2) Picture quality is very good and is definitely 1080p Cons: 1) Wall mounted. Doesn't have screws in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bourne

customer_reviews.title: You can't mount this what didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This mother simply did not work for me because there was no way to mount it. Thus I had to return it before I could even try it on my computer so I don't really have anything else to say about quality here since I didn't get a test it out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: NOT VESA mount compatible
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the tech specs, it is NOT compatible with a VESA mount. Other then that, it's a beautiful monitor. I was sad to have to send itback.
customer_reviews.author: Benjaminus

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture. HORRIBLE audio.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this monitor is a nice picture. However the built-in speakers are absolutely horrible. They sound worse than smartphone speakers but half the volume. I'm serious they're so trash, I just mute the monitor completely. Shouldn't have even come with speakers built-in.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Wilson

customer_reviews.title: This is a GREAT monitor!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small space around your Mac Mini...this is a great monitor for the money. And it does tilt up and down...it is just tight from the factory. But again, I've read other reviews (even "Professional" reviews) where folks don't seem to take 2 seconds to read any instructions otherwise they would have read that it does indeed tilt up and down.
customer_reviews.author: TEKnight Rider

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and bright, but frame is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The slim bezel is deceiving... the screen is inset which adds almost a half inch to the "frame" around the outside. For the price, I'm happy, but I can't say I'd buy these again or recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged. Waiting for replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast. Looks nice, but the screen was cracked in multiple places. It looks like I received someone else's return. Update: replacement arrived fast. So far its working well. However. It does not come with a display port cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Really great monitor. I have two and have seen others post about dissimilar color or temp of the image, and agree. One has a warmer hue than the other at factory settings. Seems like they don't have a standard color calibration at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good if it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these monitors for my home office. They both worked great for the first month. However, one of the monitors stopped turning on after one month of use... I reached out to ViewSonic to have it replaced via warranty and they told me to go back through Amazon returns and just buy another one. I am in the process of donig that now. Hopefully the new one comes and has no issues and the broken one was just a fluke. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not great but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. It wasn't very bright and I could definitely see pixels a lot more than other 27 inch monitors. It does go up to 75hrz in the resolution settings.
customer_reviews.author: RyeAlvaro

customer_reviews.title: Picture good, speakers bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model for my dental treatment rooms so that patients may have a pleasurable distraction from dental work.... The picture is great, but the speaker output is too weak with no way to boost the sound... I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Garger

customer_reviews.title: It has "speakers" . . .
customer_reviews.text: It "has speakers" but they share the quality of cheaply made ear plugs! Even at maximum volume they just sound like a really loud headset! The quality of screen was okay and I really liked the blue light limitation but the lack of actual speaks kill this product for me. If my dog chews food, from across the room, louder than my speaks volume then it's a problem for me!
customer_reviews.author: Colt

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Viewsonic monitors and this one is no exception. My only critique is that the monitor can't swivel up or down or side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R.

customer_reviews.title: I like the low glare aspect best
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a find monitor. It seems to be a low glare display which I like since there is a window nearby which was harder to see during certain hours of the day. I don't game with this monitor so no input from me there.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Ekis

customer_reviews.title: brightness suffers due to IPS, however the displayport and hdmi capability shine.
customer_reviews.text: the involvement of hdmi and displayport compatibility into this model year's specs, help compatibility in outdoor field installations. brightness suffers in bright natural light, believe IPS has narrow brightness caps than older tech models.
customer_reviews.author: Deconstructivism Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it to connect to my Macbook for remote work. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Showvun

customer_reviews.title: Stand Assembly doesn’t Fit
customer_reviews.text: Stand assembly doesn’t fit, now monitor is useless. My co-worker purchased the same one and having the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy this for the Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, love the frame-less design but if you are going to rely on the built in speakers you are going to be VERY disappointed. They are unbelievably horrible. The picture quality, size, and everything else is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Starter Monitor
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to buy a first-time monitor for your school-age kids, look no further than this monitor. The compact, sleek design is perfect for small apartment spaces.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Unable to mount to stand or wall without adapter
customer_reviews.text: Last September, I purchased a ViewSonic VX2776-SMHD 27" on Amazon and would currently rate it 2 out of 5 stars. Here are three quick reasons why: 1. DisplayPort doesn't work - HDMI works but not DisplayPort - I need both to work for my computer setup. 2. Sound quality is weak. 3. I had to buy an adapter to mount and isn't flush with other monitor that isn't same model. Please let me switch this out for something that will restore my faith in ViewSonic.
customer_reviews.author: HiFi Society

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but noticed the white in these was "yellow ...
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor but noticed the white in these was "yellow tinted" and wasn't able to adjust the color settings/brightness to "whiten it up"
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good quality picture speaker sound is a c- but I use external speakers Had to order a $7 cable to hook the high def up . Warehouse buy at a great price. OK .
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Super good for WFH
customer_reviews.text: With COVID, needed something to work here. Good price, good quality, good contrast and brightness. Really liked it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ihunt

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 and they work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing, only sad part is that you can not connect one monitor with the other and then connected to the Laptop/Desktop to have multiple Monitors connected, had to purchase an graphic Card with HDMI and DisplayPort plugs so I could connected both on the same time, but besides that they are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Roessner

customer_reviews.title: Warning - you can't mount this on a monitor arm stand
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see that in the description. There was also a comparison chart that didn't mention. I wouldn't have bought it if I'd known that.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brown

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Left side of screen was completely dim. I could barely read or see what was on the left side of the screen. Was very excited to receive, but extremely disappointed once it was plugged in. No option to replace, only to "re-order". Its not on sale anymore, so I guess I'm keeping my money.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed this monitor for my work at home job. It arrived really quickly and it was easy to set up however, I was able to purchase blue light glasses. And the overall quality of the screen improved. This is due to my continuous eyestrain on computers. This monitor comes with HDMI and DVI.
customer_reviews.author: Kymetra

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about computers or monitors, but my husband knows a lot and he helped me pick this out. I love love love it and he’s very jealous now that my monitor is nicer than his ;). I use this with a Mac mini and they look beautiful together. I couldn’t be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bete

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture; Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: The picture is crystal clear. I have had ViewSonics before and they do last. A monitor of this quality and price should have better speakers; they are poor. If I had known about the speakers before I purchased this I would have probably pick a different monitor and/or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor with Poor Stand
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is outstanding, but the stand is a bit of a disappointment. The stand is wobbly. There is some "play" where the stand connects to the monitor. I have several other ViewSonic monitors and this is not what I would expect from ViewSonic.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is amazing, and the monitor looks very elegant on my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this set up with a docking station connected to a 17" laptop that I use for work/school. The picture quality is amazing, and the monitor looks very elegant on my desk. Working on the larger screen is a serious improvement over my laptop screen, I highly recommend taking the plunge! The only downside is not being able to adjust the height/angle of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: EngineeringStudent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monitor for my use
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price. Brightness and viewability perfect for my needs. Wish it had a couple USB ports, but otherwise, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Everything you ask for, comes with HDMI
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor that is easy to assemble. The stand is a two-part assembly that requires no screws or tools. I got the smallest size, but the display quality is good as any. It comes with a lot of accessories - an hdmi cable, a dvi cable, and an audio cable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D Parker

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipoing
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed when I couldn’t get them anywhere. Quick shipping and I am happy. Although I haven’t hooked them up yet. Will get done soon as computer is finished
customer_reviews.author: Sugamama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer monitor. The resolution is fantastic and the 24" frameless screen is just the right size for my home computer desk. The screen is very thin and lightweight. The HDMI connection is a nice feature and a plus. I highly recommend this computer monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Rewster

customer_reviews.title: The monitor I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it looks very nice and stylish. It's very thin and will for sure fit your workplace Picture quality is great For the price - best monitor on the market
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Zheshinsky

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I am a small business owner who does some desktop publishing. I replaced a ViewSonic monitor I purchased about 7 years ago with this one. The monitor is easy to set up, plugs directly into my Mac and has a beautiful picture. It is large enough to keep a few screens open at one time to make my work easier. It's also great for watching videos. I don't do serious photo editing or gaming so I cannot speak to those aspects. That said, this monitor is a measure to own and use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Schollenberger

customer_reviews.title: Great good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good I overclocked mine to 75hertz from 60 hertz with no issues and working perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Zaker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. The picture isn't exceptionally clear, but it is good enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these on Prime day for $100 bucks each. Nice monitors but be aware there is no DVI input (but a DVI to HDMI adapter will do the trick)
customer_reviews.author: S. Milan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has much less glare than previous monitors I have had. I love the look of the thin edge and the value for the size and quality cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kollar

customer_reviews.title: Great little screen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hook up to my laptop and it does the job. The quality is better than I was expecting. The internal speakers are terrible, so if you’re planning on needing sound, you’ll need external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good enough monitor with DisplayPort.
customer_reviews.text: It's very convinient monitor. It works as expected, display quality is good enough for the money. The built quality is OK, however feels cheap. The logo itself looks like written in Times New Roman in Word and placed right in the center of the stand and the bottom bar. The bottom bar itself would look 1000x better if it would be black. But the design isn't really the main feature of this otherwise fine monitor. It's main advantage is having displayport and being fairly cheap. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Multiple inputs make this monitor useful for those with older computers or up to date equipment. I use it primarily as a general purpose monitor and with Adobe Lightroom. Works well with Lightroom as the extra desktop space, compared to a 24" monitor, is useful. Comes with a three year warranty, which I hope I never have to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tk87

customer_reviews.title: The BEST monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love these Viewsonics. Bought 3 of them and they are so gorgeous. Beautiful picture and beautiful ultra thin frameless design. You can't get better quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: RWHIRN

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome screen!
customer_reviews.text: I use this screen for work at home and am very happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but no VESA mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that there is no VESA mounting. Otherwise I am happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Customer8284

customer_reviews.title: Love it... but sound is not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this monitor. Picture is great! Only weakness is sound / audio is low even at 100%. I am using this as a second monitor so I really don't need sound.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: Nice, bright and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice, bright and sharp. Works perfectly with my Mac Mini (2011). Minor drawbacks: 1) documentation is much too sparse (I would like to understand more about the adjustments) 2) ViewSonic does not provide any color profile or (color information to create one) so adjusting for color matching is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: fgf

customer_reviews.title: Nice Monitor
customer_reviews.text: has clarity and brightness but the stand is a bit limiting...rather short
customer_reviews.author: Phelps NY Chick

customer_reviews.title: Broken in two months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor on October 16th 2017. Today, December 23rd 2017, I turned on my computer and the screen dimmed itself to "Contrast 0" without it even being touched. Pretty dissapointing. I was happy with it until today and was looking forward to some gaming during my holidays but this completely kills the whole experience. Merry Christmas to all. And by the way, bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the VP 2771 more that I purchased earlier in ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the VP 2771 more that I purchased earlier in the year. The 2771 has soft touch controls on the front panel, not on the back. I find reaching around the monitor to access the controls awkward. Plus, I have found ViewSonic's customer service department to be less than stellar.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Super thin monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of this 24" monitor for the office. It's super thin almost like the top of the line LG TV. Co-workers love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mai

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor. I got mine used, but it seemed brand new when it arrived. Beautiful picture quality, and the monitor itself looks really sleek/clean. I will say, be careful with it because it is extremely thin. I believe if it were to drop on the floor or something it would snap in half
customer_reviews.author: senad p.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading illustration, cannot mount as intended
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is very nice. I did have a problem though. The online picture did not match the back of the monitor. I needed a 4-bolt pattern to attach to my wall mount. I ended up swapping the new monitor for another older one in the house to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: PDXski

customer_reviews.title: The pictures don't do ot justice!
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this monitor don't do it justice! This is a very thin monitor with an elegant stand and finish that PERFORM! Amazing display. I was originally not excited about the stand, but it has really grown on me. Superb monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pugh

customer_reviews.title: I got this since I have a perfectly good laptop and will likely get another when it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this since I have a perfectly good laptop and will likely get another when it is time, so getting a desktop was not worth the money. Screen is just what I need for size and function. I am not doing anything hugely dynamic so I am not really testing the monitor itself, I am simply performing everyday tasks and coding for research.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Woodall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor! Slim and has great screen quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with the speedy delivery of the monitor and took advantage of Amazon's savings! It's slim and has excellent picture quality! Love Viewsonic and hope to buy a second one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not mountable
customer_reviews.text: I should have checked that but I did not. They stand makes them shake at the slightest touch and they are not mountable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hood
